title: Founder
summary: Lead the vision and execution of modern Jamstack sites and composable commerce experiences focused on speed, scalability, and creativity.
highlights: Lead web design and development for marketing and eCommerce websites
Implement Jamstack architecture to improve performance, security, and scalability
Build headless commerce integrations with Shopify and BigCommerce
Create component-based design systems to improve consistency and speed to market
Manage end-to-end delivery from strategy and UX to deployment and optimization
Ensure sites meet Core Web Vitals, accessibility, and SEO best practices
achievements: Delivered high-performance sites optimized for Core Web Vitals and accessibility
Enabled faster marketing updates with composable, CMS-driven workflows
